name: FilterFramework for .NET
body:
### Introduction
Filter out a list of objects based on some properties and their value with this library. See the [FilterFramework/Samples/FilterTest.cs](https://github.com/ashokgelal/NetFilterFramework/blob/master/FilterFramework/Samples/FilterTest.cs) class for some examples.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
